roleset.name: to solidify or thicken
roleset.note: CONGEAL-V NOTES: Frames file for 'congeal' based on survey of sentences in Webtext 2.5-2. No VerbNet entry. Comparison with 'solidify' and 'thicken.' (from congeal.01-v predicate notes)

role.descr: instrument of congealing when separate from arg 0
start material, when separate mention from arg 1 (unlikely to occur)
end state, congealed into what? when separate mention from arg 1

example.name: transitive
example.text: She congealed the flowing blood into a thick black mass with a drop of her magic salve.
example.arg: with a drop of her magic salve
